symbols.name: read_bytes_finish
symbols.summary: Finish an operation started by [method@Valent.ClipboardAdapter.read_bytes].

symbols.name: send_message
symbols.summary: Send @message via @adapter.  Call [method@Valent.MessagesAdapter.send_message_finish] to get the result.

symbols.name: send_message_finish
symbols.summary: Finish an operation started by [method@Valent.MessagesAdapter.send_message].

symbols.name: set_default_input
symbols.summary: Set the default input stream for @adapter to @stream.

symbols.name: set_default_output
symbols.summary: Set the default output stream for @adapter to @stream.

symbols.name: set_level
symbols.summary: Set the level of @stream (eg. speaker volume, microphone sensitivity).  Implementations that override this method should also override [vfunc@Valent.MixerStream.get_level].

symbols.name: set_locked
symbols.summary: Set whether the session is locked.

symbols.name: set_muted
symbols.summary: Set the muted state of @stream.  Implementations that override this method should also override [vfunc@Valent.MixerStream.get_muted].

symbols.name: set_position
symbols.summary: Set the current position in seconds.

symbols.name: set_repeat
symbols.summary: Set the repeat mode of @player to @repeat.

symbols.name: set_shuffle
symbols.summary: Set whether playback order is shuffled.

symbols.name: set_volume
symbols.summary: Set the volume level of @player.

symbols.name: shutdown
symbols.summary: Handle the shutdown phase of the application.  Implementations should override this method to reverse anything done in [vfunc@Valent.ApplicationPlugin.startup].

symbols.summary: Handle the startup phase of the application.  Implementations may override this method to perform setup task that should ...

symbols.name: stop

symbols.summary: No description available.

symbols.name: unexport_player
symbols.summary: Unexport @player from @adapter.

symbols.summary: Finish an operation started with [method@Valent.Channel.upload].

symbols.name: write_bytes
symbols.summary: Set the content of the clipboard.  Call [method@Valent.ClipboardAdapter.write_bytes_finish] to get the result.
